item.title: Birds of feather planning session
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
If not done yet, please add your Fediverse handles here: RSVP - Meet and Greet

BoF proposals can be found here: https://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/tag/bof

(Moderators are in bold, Times are UTC)

10:00-11:00
Room A: The fediverse as an educational platform ( morgan ; mayel; jfred; der.hans; Adrian (I can’t make it this early) Chris) The fediverse as an educational platform

Room B: Discovery for Interoperability sebastian cj michael

Room C:

Room D:

11:00-12:00

Room A: (merged two sessions) ActivityPub Experimentation: Towards AP v2 and Getting extensions into the ActivityStreams 2.0 namespace rhiaro Chris hellekin pukkamustard mayel cj, Michael

Room B

Room C

Room D

12:00-13:00

Room A: Scaling Up Cooperation hellekin mayel cj

Room B

Room C

Room D Spritely (or ocaps or virtual worlds) BoF? ( Chris , jfred, mayel, rzr?) Spritely (or ocaps or virtual worlds) BoF?

13:00-14:00

Room A How to use Groups (mayel, jfred, sebastian, chris ) michael

Room B

Room C: Events in ActivityPub mayel, Michael, Sebastian, der.hans

Room D: The ActivityPub Test suite cj

14:00-15:00
Room A AP Mashup? How would you like disparate AP services to intermingle? der.hans , jfred, Chris

Room B "Topics" and Services we can subscribe to | schmittlauch , sebastian, mayel, Adrian, Michael

Room C

Room D

15:00-16:00

Room A Intermapping see Also: https://talk.incommon.cc/t/about-intermapping/619 natacha schmittlauch hellekin pukkamustard Morgan Chris

Room B Implementing ActivityPub Client-to-Server moderated by CJ, Sebastian

Room C

Room D

item.title: Birds of feather planning session
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
#apconf

ActivityPub Conference 2020 Virtual

A conference about the present and future of ActivityPub, the world’s leading federated social web standard. Presentations of prepared talks followed by a loosely structured unconference. #apconf

A meeting to organize all the Birds of a feather sessions
